Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUIView.controllers

Class ChooseColorController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUIView.controllers.ChooseColorController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class ChooseColorController extends Object implements GUIController
ChooseColorController class is a controller, it is used to display students of five different colors and to handle the choice of the desired color

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    ChooseColorController()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    chooseStudent(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Method chooseStudent handles the double click event that allows to choose the color of the student which is also sent to the server.
    void
    createColorfulButtons()
    Method createColorfulButtons creates five different buttons of the same colors of the students
    javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
    createStudentSpace()
    Method createStudentSpace creates a space where a student of one of the five different colors is individually displayed
    javafx.scene.Scene
    getScene()
    Method getScene returns the scene representing the choice of one of the five colors
    void
    selectButton()
    Method selectButton allows to change the color of the depicted student by pressing the button of the desired color
    void
    setGui(GUI gui)
    Method setGui sets the GUI reference to the local controller.
    void
    uploadImages()
    Method uploadImages is used to load images representing students of different colors from resources folder

    • chooseStudent

      public void chooseStudent(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Method chooseStudent handles the double click event that allows to choose the color of the student which is also sent to the server.

      public void selectButton()
      Method selectButton allows to change the color of the depicted student by pressing the button of the desired color

      public void uploadImages()
      Method uploadImages is used to load images representing students of different colors from resources folder

      public void createColorfulButtons()
      Method createColorfulButtons creates five different buttons of the same colors of the students

    • createStudentSpace

      public javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle createStudentSpace()
      Method createStudentSpace creates a space where a student of one of the five different colors is individually displayed
      Returns:
      a rectangular space dedicated to a student

      Method setGui sets the GUI reference to the local controller.
